Name: Årum school
Description: This was the first school I attended, it was during this time that I became interested in computers and programming.

Name: Borge secondary school
Description: During secondary school, my interest in computers had turned into a hobby. At this time I already knew a lot about computers, but I did not know much about programming. In 10th grade, I chose programming as an elective subject and that is when I got a good taste for programming. Here I got familiar with coding in Python and Scratch.

Name: Glemmen high school
Description: In my first year at Glemmen, I went into Information Technology and Media Production, which gave me some experience within both fields. In the first year, I learned basic web development with HTML, JavaScript and CSS, SQL databases, and some C#. In the media portion, I got familiar with some Adobe programs like Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign. We also had some projects involving some media production sets. In the second year, I picked IT, where I got more in-depth with the IT part. More databases, C#, networking, and user support.
